General template information

Friendly URLs

Provide brief precise friendly URLs to individual web pages. Avoid replicating concepts within the URL. For instance, if the web page is within a subsite, take the subsite path into account to avoid word duplication.

Also, all characters must be basic alphabetical and numerical entities. Avoid spaces, quotations, and any other punctuation that may cause a browser to misinterpret the file path.

Example

/about/about "libraries" in-TC-campus (no)
vs.
/about/about-libraries (better)
vs.
/about/libraries (yes)
